plugin.name: WeatherTime
plugin.title: WeatherTime Screensaver
plugin.desc: The weather data is retrieved from Weather Underground (tm). To localize your forecast you also need to find out a unambiguous wunderground.com citycode. It is advisable to use the 3-letter-code of your nearest airport, e.g. TXL for Berlin-Tegel, Germany.
plugin.creator: Martin Rehfeld
